entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
